effect.x_y: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to lower the target’s accuracy by one stage.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to lower the target’s accuracy by one stage.

short_effect.x_y: Has a 30% chance to lower the target’s accuracy by one stage.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Has a 30% chance to lower the target’s accuracy by one stage.

flavor_text.x_y: The user lets loose a flash of energy at the target from its polished body. This may also lower the target’s accuracy.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user lets loose a flash of energy at the target from its polished body. This may also lower the target’s accuracy.
